name: The Ever Running Knight
description:
In this little adventure, you play as the knight Fridolin. Your wife has been kidnaped and YOU have to save her. Therefore you must climb a tower. In the tower, you have to get through a maze and for each floor, you only have 7 moves, so be careful and think before you move. The game was made within 96 hours in the Legacy Mob Beginner Game Jam #7. It was made by 2 junior devs from Germany and it was our first game ever finished. We hope you enjoy our indie game :D

Sound:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nx5HXT7xSj0https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Scott_Holmes/cinematic-background-music/missi...

Asset: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
